Felisia is a boardgames and food lover. \n A newbie developer in Android programming.\n Contact her if you want to ask more about this app

Obese \n You need extra effort to get ideal weight. But you have a talent to be a food taster
Overweight\n You need to do litle excercises in life. Overweight can be obesity in no time!
Ideal \n You have the ideal weight! Many people really want to be like you! Keep it up!
Underweight \n Eat more! One of happiness in life is to be able to eat, do not take it for granted.
